data.comment: The match is underway in Saint Etienne.
Ball safe as Saint-Etienne is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 7, Free kick for Rennes in the half of Saint-Etienne.
Corner awarded to Rennes.
Can Rennes capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Saint-Etienne's half?
In the minute 8, Throw-in for Saint-Etienne at Stade Geoffroy Guichard.
Throw-in for Saint-Etienne in the half of Rennes.
Free kick Rennes.
In the minute 11, Saint-Etienne awarded a free kick in their own half.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Benoit Bastien signals a free kick to Rennes just outside Saint-Etienne's area.
In the minute 14, Rennes to take a throw-in in Saint-Etienne territory.
Rennes have a goal kick.
Saint-Etienne have been awarded a corner by Benoit Bastien.
In the minute 19, Benoit Bastien signals a free kick to Rennes in their own half.
Free kick for Rennes in their own half.
Can Rennes get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Saint-Etienne's half?
In the minute 25, Throw-in Saint-Etienne.
Rennes have been awarded a corner by Benoit Bastien.
Saint-Etienne awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 28, Rennes pushes forward through Sehrou Guirassy, whose finish on goal is saved.
Benoit Bastien awards the home team a throw-in.
Rennes's Sehrou Guirassy gets in a shot on goal at Stade Geoffroy Guichard. But the effort is unsuccessful.
In the minute 31, Corner awarded to Rennes.
In Saint Etienne a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Throw-in for Saint-Etienne close to the penalty box.
In the minute 33, Rennes have been awarded a corner by Benoit Bastien.
Nayef Aguerd heads in to make it 0-1 at Stade Geoffroy Guichard.
Great play from Benjamin Bourigeaud to set up the goal.
In the minute 35, Saint-Etienne drives forward and Adil Aouchiche gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
Benoit Bastien awards Saint-Etienne a goal kick.
Throw-in for Rennes in their own half.
In the minute 38, Free kick in a good position for Rennes!
Throw-in for Saint-Etienne at Stade Geoffroy Guichard.
Corner awarded to Saint-Etienne.
In the minute 42, Benoit Bastien signals a Saint-Etienne throw-in in Rennes's half.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Saint-Etienne have a dangerous throw-in.
In the minute 44, Benoit Bastien signals a free kick to Rennes.
Benoit Bastien signals a Rennes throw-in in Saint-Etienne's half.
Benoit Bastien awards the home team a throw-in.
In the minute 45, 1 minutes will be added to the 1st half.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Saint Etienne.
In the minute 45, The first-half has come to a close in Saint Etienne.
Martin Terrier is down and play has been interrupted for a few moments.
The whistle has gone to start the second-half.
In the minute 46, Throw-in Rennes.
Martin Terrier has recovered and rejoins the match in Saint Etienne.
Claude Puel is making the team's first substitution at Stade Geoffroy Guichard with Yvan Neyou replacing Zaydou Youssouf.
Saint-Etienne are whistled for offside.
In the minute 47, Yvann Macon for Saint-Etienne drives towards goal at Stade Geoffroy Guichard. But the finish is unsuccessful.
Throw-in for Rennes in the half of Saint-Etienne.
Saint-Etienne have been awarded a corner by Benoit Bastien.
In the minute 52, Saint-Etienne advance rapidly upfield but Benoit Bastien blows for offside.
Ball safe as Rennes is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Saint-Etienne to take a throw-in in Rennes territory.
In the minute 53, Rennes awarded a free kick in their own half.
Goal! Rennes extend their lead to 0-2 through Sehrou Guirassy.
Romain Del Castillo instrumental with a fine assist.
In the minute 55, Throw-in for Rennes in their own half.
Saint-Etienne awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Free kick for Saint-Etienne in their own half.
In the minute 60, Ball goes out of play for a Rennes goal kick.
Corner awarded to Saint-Etienne.
Saint-Etienne's Mahdi Camara gets his shot away but it misses the target.
In the minute 61, Goal kick for Rennes at Stade Geoffroy Guichard.
Saint-Etienne make their second substitution with Jean-Philippe Krasso replacing Adil Aouchiche.
Saint-Etienne are too eager and fall into an offside trap.
In the minute 63, Benoit Bastien signals a free kick to Saint-Etienne.
Saint-Etienne push forward at Stade Geoffroy Guichard and Kolo gets in a great header. The attempt is cleared by the Rennes defence.
Corner awarded to Saint-Etienne.
In the minute 65, It's a goal kick for the away team in Saint Etienne.
Rennes awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Can Saint-Etienne get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Rennes's half?
In the minute 67, Saint-Etienne have been awarded a corner by Benoit Bastien.
Rennes are pushing forward but Sehrou Guirassy's finish is wide of the goal.
Goal kick for Saint-Etienne at Stade Geoffroy Guichard.
In the minute 68, Free kick Saint-Etienne.
Free kick for Saint-Etienne in the half of Rennes.
Rennes's Steven Nzonzi has been booked in Saint Etienne.
In the minute 69, Benoit Bastien signals a free kick to Rennes in their own half.
Julien Stephan (Rennes) is making a first substitution, with Flavien Tait replacing Martin Terrier.
In the minute 70, Rennes to take a throw-in in Saint-Etienne territory.
The away team replace Romain Del Castillo with Raphinha.
Throw-in for Rennes in their own half.
Benoit Bastien signals a free kick to Rennes in their own half.
Free kick for Saint-Etienne in their own half.
In the minute 73, The home team have replaced Arnaud Nordin with Maxence Rivera. This is the third substitution made today by Claude Puel.
Can Saint-Etienne get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Rennes's half?
In the minute 75, Rennes awarded a free kick in their own half.
Throw-in for Rennes in the half of Saint-Etienne.
Benoit Bastien signals a Rennes throw-in in Saint-Etienne's half.
In the minute 77, Saint-Etienne needs to be cautious. Rennes have an attacking throw-in.
Attention is being given to Rennesâ€™s Sehrou Guirassy and play has been suspended briefly.
Benoit Bastien signals a free kick to Saint-Etienne in their own half.
In the minute 78, Rennes's Sehrou Guirassy looks ok and returns to the pitch.
Ball safe as Saint-Etienne is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Throw-in for Saint-Etienne at Stade Geoffroy Guichard.
In the minute 80, In Saint Etienne a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Rennes's Hamari Traore misses with an attempt on goal.
Ball goes out of play for a Saint-Etienne goal kick.
Benoit Bastien awards the away team a throw-in.
Throw-in Saint-Etienne.
In the minute 81, Tyron Tormin is replacing Denis Bouanga for Saint-Etienne at Stade Geoffroy Guichard.
In the minute 83, Saint-Etienne's Jean-Philippe Krasso is whistled for offside at Stade Geoffroy Guichard.
Jonas Martin is replacing Benjamin Bourigeaud for the away team.
The away team has substituted Sehrou Guirassy with Adrien Hunou. Julien Stephan is thus making his fourth change.
In the minute 85, Throw-in Saint-Etienne.
Raphinha (Rennes) gets in a header on goal but the attempt is cleared.
In Saint Etienne a free kick has been awarded the home team.
In the minute 88, Benoit Bastien awards Rennes a goal kick.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
It's now 0-3 in Saint Etienne as Adrien Hunou scores for Rennes.
In the minute 89, Raphinha with an assist there.
At Stade Geoffroy Guichard, Saint-Etienne are penalized for being offside.
The 2nd half is prolonged by 4 minutes of added time.
Free kick for Saint-Etienne in the half of Rennes.
Mahdi Camara of Saint-Etienne gets in a strike, but is off target.
Rennes have a goal kick.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Saint Etienne.
Benoit Bastien signals a throw-in for Rennes, close to Saint-Etienne's area.
Saint-Etienne awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Benoit Bastien signals a free kick to Rennes.
Free kick Rennes.
Full-time! The final score is 0-3.
Georginio Rutter is on a sub for Eduardo Camavinga for Rennes.
Yvan Neyou (Saint-Etienne) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
